comments:
Created an attachment (id=76443)
big php source file with simple structure

Create a new php project and paste this php file. It contains a huge number of constant definitions. Error log will report many NPEs and trying to open this file will fail with NPE.

I am using Eclipse Europa and PDT I2007-08-16.

Maybe I got in trouble with some comments but this must not result in NPEs...
